llava img description:
In the image, there is a woman walking past a city bus on the sidewalk. She is carrying a handbag and appears to be in motion. The bus is parked on the side of the road, and there are a few other people in the scene, including one person standing near the bus and another walking in the opposite direction.

In addition to the bus, there are two cars visible in the image, one parked behind the bus and another further back on the right side. A traffic light can also be seen in the background, indicating that the scene takes place in an urban environment with busy streets.
